articles.title: Diego Maradona 'Hand of God' Argentina shirt sells for record-breaking sum at auction
articles.description: The blue shirt worn by Diego Maradona when he scored two momentous goals to knock England out of the 1986 World Cup, including the so-called ‘Hand of God’ goal, has sold for a record-breaking sum at auction.

articles.title: Soccer: Maradona's 'Hand of God' World Cup jersey sells for record $9.2M
articles.description: The Argentina jersey, which Diego Maradona wore for his "Hand of God" and "Goal of the Century" scores at the 1986 World Cup, sold for a record $9.2 million, Sotheby's auction house said Wednesday.
